First, let me say thank you to the uploader. The quality is excellent.

Now, Pimpinsince88, I am not sure exactly how you edit ID3 tags but I had no problem editing the tags. I use Winamp but there are numerous third party apps out there that can do it with no issue. Also, Windows Vista and Windows 7 have built-in ID3 tag editors within Windows Explorer. Granted, your comment is over a year old but I wanted to post this so that others aren't deterred from downloading this .torrent.

Again, NoFS, thank you.
